Title: His Mercy Endures Forever

Verses.1:
Give thanks to the Lord, he is good, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.2:
Give thanks to the God of gods, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.3:
Give thanks to the Lord of lords, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.4:
To Him who alone does great wonders, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.5:
To Him who made the heavens with wisdom, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.6:
To Him who spread the earth above the waters, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.7:
To Him who made the great lights, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.8:
the sun to rule by day, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.9:
the moon and stars to rule by night, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.10:
To him who struck down the firstborns of Egypt, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.11:
and brought Israel out from their midst, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.12:
with a strong hand and outstretched arm, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.13:
To him who split the Red Sea in two, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.14:
and drew Israel through the midst of it, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.15:
then He threw Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.16:
To him who led His people through the wilderness, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.17:
Who struck down great kings, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.18:
and brought death to the mighty kings, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.19:
Shion, king of the Amorites, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.20:
and Og, king of Bashan, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.21:
and gave their land as inheritance, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.22:
an inheritance for His servant Israel, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.23:
To Him who remembered us in our humiliation, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever,
Verses.24:
and who saved us from our enemies, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.25:
To Him who gives food to every living thing, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
Verses.26:
Give thanks to the God of heaven, [*]
	for His mercy endures forever.
